about_the_game:
Please read this before you buy DeepLands!

" DeepLands is the first ever game that I made back when I was fifteen years old. Back then I put a lot of effort into the level design, aesthetics, and creating a great atmosphere with a magical feel, not so much gameplay. Please keep this in mind before you purchase, thanks! "
- Tim Venekamp

The Game

DeepLands is a First-Person Single Player Fantasy game with Puzzle game elements as well as some horror game elements. The player will play mainly as a man who will have to find a way through the DeepLands to find his wife and a way home. The game is set in a dark and mysterious setting in the Fantasy world named Áris.

The Story

The story begins on Earth in the near future. The main character you play is a man who just bought an old house and is renovating it. Then all of a sudden strange things start to happen and then his wife disappears one day. Before even getting the chance to call the police he discovers that something is in the house... Then before he knows it he also gets dragged into the same place his wife disappeared into. But luckily he is not alone, a small friend is helping him on his journey through the DeepLands and into the strange world where he is looking to find his wife.

name: DeepLands

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Graphics: geforce gtx 560
  • Storage: 13 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Graphics: geforce gtx 960 or higher
  • Storage: 14 GB available space

short_description: You have just bought a new house, strange things start to happen, and then! you find yourself in a dark and lonely place. Now you have to find a way home, and survive the DeepLands!
